extension.summary: An add-on to view content from letmewatchthis.com
extension.description: This add-on allows to navigate the content made available by the letmewatchthis.com website, while making it look nicely integrated with XBMC's UI.
extension.disclaimer: Please configure this add-on's preferences. If you have space issues, deleting the .cache folder may be a good first option (will reload)
